Package it.polimi.deib.provaFinale2014.francesco1.corsini_gabriele.carassale.view

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    TypeOfInteraction
    Crea un'interfaccia per dichiarare i metodi guida da utilizzare nei tre casi di interfaccia: linea di comando, interfaccia grafica statica, interfaccia grafica dinamica.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AnimationJoinSheeps
    Class for the animation of the Sheep when the action JoinSheeps is performed
    AnimationJoinSheepsAfter
    Class for the animation of the Sheep AFTER the action JoinSheeps is performed
    AnimationKillSheep  
    AnimationMoveSheep
    Class for the animation of the Sheep when the action MoveSheep is performed
    BufferedImageContainer
    Class the holds all the image files
    DimanicSheepTypeButton
    Class for the buttons representing the types of the sheeps(lamb,ram,white sheep)
    DinamicJoinSheepsButton
    Class for the dynamic button of the Join sheep
    DinamicKillSheepButton
    Class for the KillSheep Button
    DinamicMoveSheepButton
    Class for the MoveSheep Button
    DinamicRoadButton
    Class for the RoadButton(it will show the shepherds too)
    DinamicSheepButton
    Class for the SheepButton in the middle of the terrain
    GUIDinamic
    Classe principale per la GUI Dinamica.
    GUIDinamicCardListener
    Class Listener for the cards
    GUIDinamicPanel
    Class for the main background Panel of the GUI
    GUISwingStatic
    Main class for the Static GUI
    LineCommand
    Implementa la classe TypeOfInteraction per gestire le interazioni tramite linea di comando
    StaticActionListener
    Class to listen to the Static Action GUI
    StaticDropDownSelectionListener
    Class for the Listener of the Drop Down menù
    StaticRoadListener
    Classe per i Bottoni delle strade nella GUI Statica
    StaticTerrainListener
    Classe per listener della GUI Statica dei terreni
    StaticTerrainTypeListener
    Classe listener che ascolta le tipologie di terreni
    ViewAnimal
    Classe rappresentate un animale nella View(pecora, agnello,montone, lupo, black)
    ViewShepherd
    Classe rappresentante uno Shepherd nella View
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    GUIDinamicState
    Class representing the various possible states of the GUI
    GUIState
    Class representing the various possible states of the GUI
